earnedRewardForDevotion: Ye'v earned <%= reward %> for being committit tae impruivin yer life.
nextRewardUnlocksIn: Chack-Ins until yer neist prize: <%= numberOfCheckinsLeft %
incentivesDescription: When it comes tae biggin habits, consistencey is key. Ilka day ye chack-in ye git close tae a prize.
incentiveBackgroundsUnlockedWithCheckins: Lockit Plain Backgrunds will unlock wi Daily Chack-Ins.
oneOfAllPetEggs: ane o ilka staundart Pet Egg
twoOfAllPetEggs: twa o ilka staundart Pet Egg
threeOfAllPetEggs: three o ilka staundart Pet Egg
oneOfAllHatchingPotions: ane o ilka staindart Cleckin Potion
threeOfEachFood: three o ilka staundart Per Food
fourOfEachFood: fower o ilka staundart Pet Food
royallyLoyalText: This uiser haes chackit in ower 500 time, an haes earnt ivery Chack-in Prize!
backloggedCheckInRewards: Ye received Chack-In Prizes! Veesit yer inventar an Abuilyiement tae see whit's new.
